Umm the film Shogun was made based on William Adams, so it might provide ex=
tra source material.  Offhand, i think that you could examine what sort of =
problems William Adams might have had fitting into such a different culture=
, and also what the similarities might have been - the UK was also pretty f=
uedal - tho not to the same extent. He might have looked for similarities b=
etween the cultures in order to start finding his way as it were. Hope this=
 helps. Email me back if you need more help.  Laura
